mean_cn: adj.无线的，与蜂窝网络相关的；蜂窝式的
mean_en: connected with or consisting of the cells of plants or animals; connected with a telephone system that works by radio instead of wires
sentence: "My cellular phone lets me call anybody
sentence_trans: 我的移动电话让我随时随地都能给任何人通话。
word_etyma: cell细胞 + u + lar形容词后缀 → cellular细胞的，移动电话
